translations.english: They established Changshan and Dai commanderies.
On the day jiachen last day of the month, there was a solar eclipse.

translations.chinese: 十一月癸卯晦，日有食之。
translations.english: On the day guimao last day of the eleventh month, there was a solar eclipse.

translations.chinese: 隨何既說黥布，布起兵攻楚。
translations.english: After Sui He persuaded Ying Bu, Bu raised troops to attack Chu.

translations.chinese: 楚使項聲、龍且攻布，布戰不勝。
translations.english: Chu sent Xiang Sheng and Long Ju to attack Bu. Bu fought but was not victorious.
